name: VerticalScope Holdings Inc. Subordinate Voting Shares
longDescription: VerticalScope is a technology company that has built and operates a cloud-based digital platform for online enthusiast communities in high-consumer spending categories. VerticalScope's mission is to enable people with common interests to connect, explore their passions and share knowledge about the things they love. Through targeted acquisitions and development, VerticalScope has built a portfolio of over 1,200 online communities and more than 110 million monthly active users.

fullAddress: 111 Peter Street,Suite 600, Suite 600, Toronto, ON, CA
